Customer Service

Significant reduction in costs as amount of telephone support calls is low


Ability to handle more than one customer whilst at all times respecting Data Protection and Compliance


We can provide 24 hour Live Web Chat support services


Provide real-time contact solutions that will increase conversions and improve customer satisfaction levels

Providing high quality, Customer interaction for Customer Service and Sales calls


Working with our clients to have fully synced calendars where appropriate


Increase your sales and Customer Interaction today and contact Intrust Communications

We will work with you to suggest ways/incentivies to either win your customers back or maintain them within the business


We will work with you to provide comprehensive feedback on why your customer felt the need to leave in the first place


We will work with you to provide a plan to ensure your customers are always kept happy and maintained with your business


Subject to client agreement we can make a follow up call after winback/ recontract to measure the success and provide comprehensive feedback to you

Flexibility to create a bespoke service for your business requirements


Responsive, professional and cost-effective solutions


High-quality customer interactions and a high return on Investment


Experience across a wide range of sectors, media and languages


Continuous real-time monitoring and reporting of your KPIs that generate the highest level of qualified leads

Experts in this Industry and will work with you as our client to improve the overall Customer Journey

Providing high quality, fully confirmed leads to our clients.


Working with our clients and have fully synced calendars where appropriate.


A text or phone call will be made 24 hours before the appointment (working day) to confirm everything is still in order.


Subject to client agreement we can make a follow up call after the appointment to measure the success and provide comprehensive feedback to our client.

Applicants must also have excellent written English and grammar as there will also be a requirement to communicate via Social Media.
